kisidu wehesa mahansiyakin thorawa kageth awadhanaya dinagatha haki bawin da, thamangema kiya deyak kirimata hakiyawak nomathikama nisa da, hakiyawak thibunath uwamanawak nathi nisa da, oluwak thibunata ee thula molayak thibena bawa nodanna heyin da, minpasu obalage blogayanhi palawana lipi, kisidu hirikithayakin thorawa kopi kota, mage men palakirimata thiranaya kalabawa karunikawa danum demi.

shrilankan komisame kalaya dikwe – anidda puwathpatha shrilankan komisame kalaya dikwe si/sa shrilankan eyar layins samagama, si/sa shrilankan ketarin samagama saha si/sa mihin lanka (pudgalika) samagama yana samagam thunehi sidu wu akramikatha pilibanda soya balimata path kala janadhipathi komisame nila kalaya 2019 pebarawari 15 wana dina dakwa dirgha kara athi bawa wartha we. 2006 wasare janawari 01 wana dina sita 2018 wasare janawari 31 wana da dakwa kala parichchedaya thula adala samagamwala siduwu bawa kiyana akramikatha pilibandawa soya balimata janadhipathiwaraya wisin mema komisama pathkala athara desambar 17 wana dina janadhipathi maithripala sirisena wisin athi wishesha gasat pathrayak mangin adala komishan sabhawa wetha athireka balathala pawara dimak sidu kara atha.
